title: Logic-Driven Cybersecurity: A Novel Framework for System Log Anomaly Detection using Answer Set Programming
summary: This study explores the application of Answer Set Programming (ASP) for detecting anomalies in system logs, addressing the challenges posed by evolving cyber threats. We propose a novel framework that leverages ASP's declarative nature and logical reasoning capabilities to encode complex security rules as logical predicates.
